ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound teriyaki-marinated pork tenderloin, thinly sliced
1 loaf whole wheat baguette, cut into four 6-inch lengths and split
1 cup seedless cucumber, chopped into matchstick pieces
1 cup carrots, chopped into matchstick pieces

cookingTips: Warm the baguette lightly to bring out its flavor and provide a crunch that contrasts with soft fillings
Slice pork tenderloin against the grain for maximum tenderness
Julienne vegetables thinly for better distribution and easier eating in handheld sandwich format
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide on assembly sequence and suggest how to warm the baguette without making it dry. Emphasize balance between spicy, savory, and fresh elements.
